title: The Beginner's Cave
author: Donald Brown
intro:
You are standing at the entrance to a mysterious cave. Rumors speak of
treasure and danger within. As a novice adventurer, this seems like the
perfect place to test your skills.

Your quest: explore the cave, defeat any monsters, and return with treasure!

rooms.name: Cave Entrance
rooms.description:
You stand at the mouth of a dark cave. Cool air flows from within.
The entrance is partially concealed by vines and moss. A narrow passage
leads deeper into the darkness to the north.

rooms.name: Dark Corridor
rooms.description:
A narrow, winding corridor stretches before you. The walls are damp
and covered with strange fungus that glows faintly, providing just enough
light to see. You hear the drip of water echoing from somewhere ahead.

rooms.name: Underground Stream
rooms.description:
A small underground stream cuts across the cave floor here. The water
is clear and cold. A wooden bridge crosses to the north, though it looks
rather rickety. To the west, you see a faint glow.

rooms.name: Storage Chamber
rooms.description:
This appears to be an old storage room. Broken crates and barrels are
scattered about. In the corner, you notice something glinting in the dim light.

rooms.name: Large Cavern
rooms.description:
You enter a vast cavern with a high ceiling. Stalactites hang overhead
like stone icicles. The air is cooler here, and you can hear movement
somewhere in the shadows.

rooms.name: Crystal Grotto
rooms.description:
This chamber is filled with beautiful crystals that emit a soft blue glow.
The walls sparkle with thousands of tiny reflections. It's quite peaceful here.

rooms.name: Goblin's Den
rooms.description:
This small cave reeks of something foul. Bones and debris are scattered
about. This appears to be someone's lair.

rooms.name: Treasure Chamber
rooms.description:
You've found it! A small chamber with an old wooden chest sitting against
the far wall. This must be where the treasure is kept. But it won't be
unguarded...

rooms.name: Outside the Cave
rooms.description:
You emerge from the cave into the fresh air and sunlight. Your adventure
is complete! You can return to town now.

items.name: rusty sword
items.description: An old iron sword, somewhat rusty but still serviceable.

items.name: leather armor
items.description: Simple leather armor that provides basic protection.

items.name: gold coins
items.description: A small pouch containing 50 gold pieces.

items.name: healing potion
items.description: A small vial containing a red liquid that smells of herbs.

items.name: treasure chest
items.description: A heavy wooden chest bound with iron. It's locked, but the lock looks old.

items.name: jeweled crown
items.description: A beautiful crown studded with gems. Quite valuable!

items.name: old map
items.description: A yellowed parchment with cryptic markings and symbols.

items.name: club
items.description: A crude wooden club, heavy and serviceable.

monsters.name: giant rat
monsters.description: A large rat with glowing red eyes and sharp teeth.

monsters.name: goblin
monsters.description: A nasty little goblin with green skin and pointed ears.

monsters.name: cave troll
monsters.description: A massive troll with gray skin and a menacing growl.

monsters.name: friendly bat
monsters.description: A small bat that seems curious rather than threatening.
